p: Pocapavir was evaluated in a volunteer challenge study conducted in Swedish IPV vaccinated population. The study was randomised, double-blind placebo-controlled (96 active, 48 placebo). All subjects were challenged with OPV type1 and housed within the clinic in groups of 18 (active: placebo, 2:1) for 14 dosing days and then followed to day 45. Safety, pharmacokinetics, amounts of virus excreted, time to virus clearance and drug susceptibility were assessed. The subjects were assessed each day during the dosing period and on days 18, 22, 29 and 43.
